      • buyShares

        public void buyShares(int amount,
                      double price)
               throws Investment.QuantityRangeError
        Buy the given number of shares for the Stock at the given price and update the current price of the Stock
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of shares to buy
        price - the buy price for each share
        Throws:
        Investment.QuantityRangeError

      • sellShares

        public int sellShares(int amount,
                      double price)
               throws Investment.QuantityRangeError,
                      Investment.PriceRangeError
        Sell the given number of shares for the Stock at the given price and update the current price of the Stock
        Parameters:
        amount - the number of shares to sell
        price - the sell price for each share
        Returns:
        remaining quantity of shares or -1 if request quantity was more than the owned quantity
        Throws:
        Investment.QuantityRangeError
        Investment.PriceRangeError
